Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.getAcquireRetryDelay()
    Use BoneCPConfig.getAcquireRetryDelayInMs() instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.hooks.AcquireFailConfig.getAcquireRetryDelay()
    Use AcquireFailConfig.getAcquireRetryDelayInMs() instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.CallableStatementHandle.getBigDecimal(int, int)
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.getCloseConnectionWatchTimeout()
    Use BoneCPConfig.getCloseConnectionWatchTimeoutInMs() instead
    com.jolbox.bonecp.ConnectionHandle.getConnectionCreationTime()
    please use ConnectionHandle.getConnectionCreationTimeInMs() instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.ConnectionHandle.getConnectionLastReset()
    Please use ConnectionHandle.getConnectionLastResetInMs() instead
    com.jolbox.bonecp.ConnectionHandle.getConnectionLastUsed()
    Use ConnectionHandle.getConnectionLastUsedInMs() instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.getConnectionTimeout()
    Use BoneCPConfig.getConnectionTimeoutInMs() instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.getIdleConnectionTestPeriod()
    Please use BoneCPConfig.getIdleConnectionTestPeriodInMinutes() instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.getIdleMaxAge()
    Use BoneCPConfig.getIdleMaxAgeInMinutes() instead
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.getMaxConnectionAge()
    Please use BoneCPConfig.getMaxConnectionAgeInSeconds() instead.

    com.jolbox.bonecp.hooks.AbstractConnectionHook.onQueryExecuteTimeLimitExceeded(String, Map)

    Use BoneCPConfig.setAcquireRetryDelayInMs(long).

    Use AcquireFailConfig.setAcquireRetryDelayInMs(long) instead.

    Use BoneCPConfig.setCloseConnectionWatchTimeoutInMs(long) instead
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.setConnectionTimeout(long)
    Use BoneCPConfig.setConnectionTimeoutInMs(long) instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.setIdleConnectionTestPeriod(long)
    Please use BoneCPConfig.setIdleConnectionTestPeriodInMinutes(long) or BoneCPConfig.setIdleConnectionTestPeriod(long, TimeUnit) instead
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.setIdleMaxAge(long)
    Use BoneCPConfig.setIdleMaxAgeInMinutes(long) or BoneCPConfig.setIdleMaxAge(long, TimeUnit) instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.setMaxConnectionAge(long)
    Please use {BoneCPConfig.setMaxConnectionAgeInSeconds(long) instead.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.setPreparedStatementsCacheSize(int)
    com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig.setQueryExecuteTimeLimit(int)
    Use BoneCPConfig.setQueryExecuteTimeLimitInMs(long) instead.
